channel.title: Can any non-tradeable NPC be a Shop?
channel.description:
So i'm making new shops for my server and I was gonna change some NPC's around.
Is it possible to make an NPC that DOESN'T have the "trade" option, be a shop?
I've tried it, but it didnt work, so i came here to double check. Thanks

item.title: Can any non-tradeable NPC be a Shop?
item.dc:creator: @suppyscape suppyscape
item.description:
@suppyscape wrote:

well, no… I can work with java talk if you just show me where to start.

I’m no coder, but I can edit very well (:

Read full topic
item.source: Can any non-tradeable NPC be a Shop?

item.title: Can any non-tradeable NPC be a Shop?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Depends on your server base, also if your not good at java talk you shouldn’t be trying to make a server, learn the basics first.

Read full topic
